name: Lumosity Brain Training
who_you_serve: People of all ages and skill levels who want to exercise and improve their cognitive abilities.
what_you_do: Lumosity provides brain-training games that exercise memory, attention, problem solving and other cognitive skills.
bio: 120 million members, published research in peer-reviewed journal, 20 years in operation
business_focus: Brain training games and cognitive exercises for improving mental performance.
service_provided: brain training games, cognitive assessments, mobile apps, progress tracking

jv_history.partner_name: Nelson Dellis (5-time USA Memory Championship winner)
jv_history.source_quote: Meet Nelson Dellis He's a familiar face for most Lumosity Members by now. Nelson Dellis has won the USA Memory Championship 5 times and, more importantly for this context, he also holds the world record for memorizing the most names in 15 minutes: 235. So when he heard about our new game, What's my Name?, he was immediately keen to try memorizing all 100 faces.
